wikipedia_page.main: Neel Burton (born 3 June 1978 in Mauritius, Indian Ocean) is a British psychiatrist, philosopher, writer, and educator. He is the author of several books, including Psychiatry (2006), Living with Schizophrenia (2007), The Meaning of Madness (2008), Master your Mind (2009), Heaven and Hell: The Psychology of the Emotions (2015), and Hypersanity: Thinking Beyond Thinking (2019).
